parameters: \C[10]\n<Hart>I can't chat much Dave. Got a bitch in there. You brought the $20?
\n<Levi>\C[18]We were planning on taking it tomorrow for the fireworks.
\n<Hart>\C[10]Gay. It's your first acid trip, you're guaranteed to have a good time no matter what. You'll still be tripping tomorrow. Just take it now.
\n<Hart's Mom>\C[5]HART! I TOLD YOU TO CLEAN THE FUCKING BATHROOM!
\C[10]\n<Hart>Total bitch, right? I'll be here the rest of the night if you need to re-up.
\C[10]Ya gotta wait for it to hit, dumbass.

\C[21]Yeah man, I think that's a good idea. We'll get out of your hair.

Got LSD! Got Weed! Got Oxycodone! Got Adderall! Got Spice!
\C[21]Still can't believe I kicked Hart's ass...
